attributes.description:
2011 MINI Countryman Cooper S Steptronic for sale. Don't miss this awesome clean automatic Mini!
Car comes with full service history and books.
Standard Features: ABS | Aircon | Alloy Wheels | Central Locking | Electric Mirrors | Electric Windows | Metallic Paint | Power Steering | Radio/CD |

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Mini Countryman Cooper S Automatic 
Power - 135 kW @ 5500 rpm
Torque - 240 Nm @ 1600 rpm
Economy - 7.5 l/100km
Emissions - 175 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 6 / FRONT
Acceleration - 7.9 seconds
Top Speed - 210 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,110 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 47 litres
Boot Capacity - 350 litres
Service Intervals - 25,000 km
